document.heading: Public Housing Homeownership Tax Abatement Amendment Act of 1992

history.narrative: Law 9-120, the “Public Housing Homeownership Tax Abatement Amendment Act of 1992,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 9-356, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 3, 1992, and April 7, 1992, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 24, 1992, it was assigned Act No. 9-194 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 9-120 became effective on June 11, 1992.
